name: Flappy Ware
description:
Guide the arrow to the apple, avoiding the man and obstacles along the way. Left mouse button or "/" to jump.

Made with p5.js. Special thanks to MolleIndustria, Allison Parrish, and (of course) Dr. S for reference and help along the way.

Kenney assets from the following packs:

  • Background elements redux
  • Game icons (and expansion)
  • Foliage pack
  • Scribble platformer
  • Simplified platformer
  • Toon characters
  • Voxel pack
  • UI pack
  • Font pack

Made for CMI 4301 at Texas Tech, Spring 2020.
